Entries: List of sequences to randomly step through
bIgnoreForRelevancyTest: If true, "Relevant anim" nodes that look for the highest weighted animation in a state will ignore this node
BlendWeight: Last encountered blend weight for this node
bShuffleMode:
When shuffle mode is active we will never loop a sequence beyond MaxLoopCount
without visiting each sequence in turn (no repeats). Enabling this will ignore
ChanceToPlay for each entry
